name: Medical Supplies Classification
description: Classification dataset for different types of medical supplies and equipment

classes.name: Surgical Instruments
classes.description: Precision tools used in surgical procedures including scalpels, forceps, scissors, and clamps
examples: Stainless steel surgical scalpel with disposable blade for precise incisions
Hemostatic forceps for clamping blood vessels during surgery
Surgical scissors with curved blades for tissue cutting

classes.name: Diagnostic Equipment
classes.description: Medical devices used for patient examination and diagnosis including stethoscopes, thermometers, and blood pressure monitors
examples: Digital stethoscope with noise cancellation for cardiac auscultation
Infrared thermometer for non-contact temperature measurement
Automatic blood pressure monitor with digital display

classes.name: Disposable Supplies
classes.description: Single-use medical items including syringes, gloves, masks, and bandages
examples: Sterile disposable syringes with safety needles for injections
Nitrile examination gloves powder-free for patient protection
Surgical face masks with fluid resistance and bacterial filtration

classes.name: Patient Monitoring
classes.description: Electronic devices for continuous patient vital sign monitoring including ECG machines, pulse oximeters, and cardiac monitors
examples: 12-lead ECG machine with digital display and printing capability
Pulse oximeter with finger probe for oxygen saturation monitoring
Cardiac monitor with arrhythmia detection and alarm system

classes.name: Rehabilitation Equipment
classes.description: Therapeutic devices and tools for patient recovery including wheelchairs, crutches, and exercise equipment
examples: Lightweight wheelchair with adjustable footrests and armrests
Adjustable aluminum crutches with ergonomic hand grips
Physical therapy exercise bands with varying resistance levels
